name: Andy Stahl
descriptions: Andy Stahl is the business manager of the Brass Lantern in Megaton in Fallout 3. He's the brother of Jenny Stahl and Leo Stahl, who mean the world to him.
The oldest of the Stahl siblings running Moriarty's competition,
That said, Andy isn't actually happy in Megaton, considering it a hole and a dead end, with its only saving grace being the revenue it generates for him and his family.
The combination of hostility and constant work causes other Megaton denizens to consider him a workaholic.

topics.response_text: Hey, I've been wanting to talk to you. Leo told me what you said to him. You know, about his problem.Play soundFO3 AndyStahl WantingToTalk.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_WantingToTalk.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Do I look like someone that you want to blow off?
topics.response_text: Okay, tough guy. Say what's on your mind.{Annoyed, but intimidated nonetheless. }Play soundFO3 AndyStahl OkayToughGuy.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_OkayToughGuy.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I'm sorry to interrupt, Andy. I just had a few questions.
topics.response_text: [sighs] I suppose. Just make it quick.Play soundFO3 AndyStahl MakeItQuick.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_MakeItQuick.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I could use some directions around town.
topics.response_text: You know, you're right  I guess I do look like a sign post. [sighs] Where do you want to go?{Annoyed at being interrupted. Sarcastic.}Play soundFO3 AndyStahl LookLikeASignPost.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_LookLikeASignPost.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Is there a bar in town?
topics.response_text: Are you joking? Yes, there's a bar  The Brass Lantern. It's easy to find since you're standing in it.Play soundFo3 AndyStahl AreYouJoking.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Fo3_AndyStahl_AreYouJoking.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Where can I rent a bed?
topics.response_text: Up at Moriarty's at the south end of town. Talk to Nova, she'll help you out.Play soundFO3 AndyStahl UpAtMoriartys.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_UpAtMoriartys.oggnoicon

You'll want to see Doc Church next to the Crater. Take your time.{Coldly. He might be wishing for your death just so you'll leave him alone.}Play soundFO3 AndyStahl WantToSeeDoc.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_WantToSeeDoc.oggnoicon

Oh, no problem. I'm not busy at all. Yep. Plenty of time to talk to strangers.{Extremely sarcastic.}Play soundFO3 AndyStahl ImNotBusy.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_ImNotBusy.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Is there a weapons dealer around here?
topics.response_text: Go see Moira at Craterside Supply. She sells some weapons. Makes some too, from what I hear. Her place is down by the crater.Play soundFO3 AndyStahl GoSeeMoira.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_GoSeeMoira.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: That's all I needed to know.
I'm looking for my father. Middle-aged guy. Maybe you've seen him?
topics.response_text: Not in here, I haven't.{ }Play soundFO3 AndyStahl NotInHere.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_NotInHere.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Megaton?
topics.response_text: It's a hole. A dead end. So why I do stay? Well... it's a hole that makes me money.{ }Play soundFO3 AndyStahl ItsAHole.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_ItsAHole.oggnoicon

Moriarty pisses in his still  crazy bastard thinks it's hilarious. Besides, you'll get your throat cut in that pit. You're much better off here.{Very flippant and blowing the player off.}Play soundFO3 AndyStahl PissesInHisStill.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_PissesInHisStill.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Know anything about the area outside Megaton?
topics.response_text: Outside of Megaton? Any place other than here sounds like heaven to me. Fuck this place.Play soundFO3 AndyStahl OutsideOfMegation.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_OutsideOfMegation.oggnoicon

conversation.response_text: Whatever. I need to get back to work.{ }Play soundFO3 AndyStahl BackToWork.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_BackToWork.oggnoicon
Can I help you, Sheriff?{Annoyed at being interrupted.}Play soundFO3 AndyStahl CanIHelpYouSheriff…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_CanIHelpYouSheriff.oggnoicon
Yeah, Leo... what do you need?Play soundFO3 AndyStahl WhatDoYouNeed.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_WhatDoYouNeed.oggnoicon

I noticed some irregularities in the logs here. Are you tracking the drinks that you're selling like I told you?Play soundFO3 AndyStahl NoticedSomeIrregul…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_NoticedSomeIrregularities.oggnoicon
Yeah. Good idea. Not gonna happen.Play soundFO3 AndyStahl GoodIdea.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_GoodIdea.oggnoicon

If these books don't add up, I don't know how much money we have, then how are we supposed to stay in business? Would you just be more careful?Play soundFO3 AndyStahl BooksDontAddUp.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_BooksDontAddUp.oggnoicon
You can tell me that when you're the one paying the bills, Leo.Play soundFO3 AndyStahl YouCanTellMe.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_YouCanTellMe.oggnoicon

combat.response_text: I've had enough of you!Play soundFO3 AndyStahl HadEnoughOfYou.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_AndyStahl_HadEnoughOfYou.oggnoicon
